title: What is the difference between the black and the gold versions of the Mate7?
answer:
The Mate7 comes in 3 different colors and 2 different configurations. The Obsidian Black and the Silver have the same configuration.

The Amber Gold comes with 3GB RAM and 32GB internal storage as opposed to the 2GB RAM and 16GB internal storage for the black and silver models. Also, the Amber Gold Mate7 is a dual-sim handset supporting one Micro-SIM and a Nano-SIM. Whereas the Black and Silver models are single SIM handsets.
